title: Wembley ball girl and bringing piano to Euros - Agyemang's journey
summary: England forward Michelle Agyemang was a ball girl four years ago at Wembley. Now she is making an impact for the Lionesses at Euro 2025.

title: Hosts Morocco into Wafcon final after shootout win over Ghana
summary: Morocco will face Nigeria in the final of Wafcon 2024 after beating Ghana 4-2 on penalties following a 1-1 draw in Rabat.

title: Will Scottish teams avoid European coefficient abyss?
summary: Scotland's clubs stand on a coefficient cliff edge as three of their five representatives begin their European campaigns this week.

title: Dundee win & Motherwell through - Premier Sports Cup round-up
summary: Dundee secure their first win under Steven Pressley at the third time of asking, but male hard work of things at Lowland League side Bonnyrigg Rose, while Motherwell secure their place in the next round.
